title: Peloton, Nvidia, Airbnb, Expedia: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Peloton shares plunged on disappointing subscriber growth; Expedia gained on strong earnings
body:
Wall Street indexes climbed after jobs figures showed that hiring picked up in October and the unemployment rate fell. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
